name: Summer Roguelike Project - Finale
description:
This is my final entry for Reddit's Summer Roguelike Tutorial.

For several weeks, I used Construct 3 to complete the required steps and posted the results here. This final version is a fully-fledged roguelike!

I also posted a lot of progress pics/gifs here on Twitter!

This project is open source! You can download a copy of the Construct 3 file here. (Warning: the code is pure spaghetti). You will need to have these three addons installed in order to view/edit the project.

For the final week, I focused on: 

  • Adding in equipment pickups.
  • Adding in additional sound effects.
  • Adding a Grayscale mode.
    • You can tap the "C" key to toggle this on/off.
  • Making small tweaks and balance changes.

If you have any feedback, feel free to leave it below!
